column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday July 6 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: The roadway is shut down in both directions between Patchen Dr and Mt Tabor Rd due to downed power lines as a result of a collision.
Inbound traffic diverted to N Mt Tabor Rd toward Old Todds Rd.
Outbound traffic diverted to Patchen Dr or Old Todds Rd.
Service Rd access is very limited.  Motorists should avoid this area if possible.
